events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system identified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's message keywords.
Assigning the case to the refund specialist team for further handling and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process the refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and the attached photo clearly shows the incorrect product I received.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund immediately and send you a confirmation email shortly.
I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the refund confirmation.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please check your email for the confirmation and let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory from your side.
I received the refund and everything is perfect now. Thank you for the excellent support!
Closing the case as the refund issue has been successfully resolved and customer confirms satisfaction.
Sending a satisfaction survey to get your feedback on the support experience you received.
